extendedInfo.description: Keeping up with friends is faster than ever.â¢ See what friends are up toâ¢ Share updates, photos and videosâ¢ Get notified when friends like and comment on your postsâ¢ Text, chat and have group conversationsâ¢ Play games and use your favorite appsNow you can get early access to the next version of Facebook for Android by becoming a beta tester. Learn how to sign up, give feedback and leave the program in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/133NwuP Facebook is only available for users age 13 and over.Terms of Service: http://m.facebook.com/terms.php.

reviews.title: Lacks too many of the desktop functions
reviews.comment: Is there a reason why this lacks manageable functions? Events, pages etc are all too basic? I prefer using desktop version in my mobile browser.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very friendly app
reviews.comment: Very good experience. Its running very fast & smooth and of course very friendly.
reviews.author: Mohammed Haseeb

reviews.comment: The updates are fearsome but they eventually get better.

reviews.title: Casio Commander
reviews.comment: Will have to give it a wait and see thing on this new phone, but so far just from messing around with it, it seems to be faster than the other version I had on my previous phone.

reviews.title: Latest update
reviews.comment: After the latest update (I suppose the beta update), the app crashes every minute, and then reopen. It\'s annoying.

reviews.title: Dont do it!!!!
reviews.comment: It had issues from the start.  To many to name but: 1. When posting and typing comments the post would disappear. 2. While typing the app would freeze. 3. After posting it would not appear after multiple times.  enough said don\'t you think!

reviews.title: Much improved.
reviews.comment: The latest versions have been massive jumps in usability and speed.  Keep it up.

reviews.title: Notifications doent work
reviews.comment: I dont get any notifications any more.... Just get a number on the Earthball of the app but no F in the notificationbar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can be better.
reviews.comment: After the latest update to native code the app is super fast compared to the old app but still I can see scrolling through the feed it slutters a lot. Still no native tablet app.  It sucks that I cannot sync my Facebook Contact phone numbers with nexus phone, worst part the third party apps are not allowed to do it, so all I can sync are the contact pics and the dumb facebook email address which no one uses.  They need to fix this with google as more nexus phones are coming out with Htc One and Galaxy S4
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.comment: Thanks for everything! Currently I am happy with my FB

reviews.title: Needs a tablet-optimised app!
reviews.comment: It\'s 2013. You\'d think they\'d take pride in their product and release something presentable. Tons of new Android tablet owners are going to download the app from their favorite social network and are going to be disappointed.   Oh well, at least it works.
